sentences: Ta on esimene kord selles linnas.
context: The word 'esimese' is the genitive singular form of the Estonian adjective 'esimene', which means 'first'. In Estonian, adjectives change their endings depending on case and number. Here, '-se' ending indicates it's in the genitive case (showing possession or relationship). This form would be used after prepositions like 'pärast' (after) or when indicating something related to the first person/thing.
